name: Zucchini Fries
description: These zucchini fries are light, crispy, gluten-free, and full of flavour. They’re also ready in under 15 minutes! Serve them with your favourite dipping sauces—aioli, ranch dressing, and marinara sauce—for a crowd-pleasing appetizer or side dish. No matter what you serve them with, they're a fun way for kids and adults alike to eat more vegetables.

ingredients.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning or Cajun Fries Seasoning

preparation: Slice zucchinis into sticks (fries) and place in a large bowl. Toss with mayonnaise and seasoning until evenly coated.
Place coating mix in a shallow dish. Using tongs or your hands, add zucchini sticks one at a time, rotating and pressing to coat.
Place zucchini sticks in air fryer and cook 8 min, or until crispy and starting to brown. Depending on the size of your air fryer, you may need to do this in batches. Do not overcrowd.
tips: Serve with prepared Chipotle Aioli, Roasted Garlic Aioli, or Creamy Ranch Dip for dipping.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve as a side dish with a 4 oz (113 g) chicken burger with a bun.
